author: Karl Nippoldt
comment: This is a really nice watchface! I'd appreciate it, though, if it has some settings for the watch hands when in ambient mode. With just the outlines as it is now, sometimes it can be a bit difficult to read.
title: Good, could use some improvements in ambient mode

author: Stanley M
comment: I remember a watch with rubber band from Italy name "O'clock", that have very similar design with simOclock. But I always appreciated hard work and I do hope you could provide plain black background for amoled screen like G Watch R. Now the black one seems like just dark grey. And ability to change between watch and phone battery info would be greatly appreciate. Thanks.
title: Mmmh.

author: jim hayward
comment: On my polar m600 the black background is more of a grey which doesn't look so great in my opinion. Also the default template choices don't update properly and I had to change the appearance in the custom setting tab

author: Del-tanian
comment: It's a nice watch face but yet I don't feel it's simple enough for me. I do like that the watch face shows the battery percentage even if that downgrades it's simplicity

author: Sumit Ahlawat
comment: I installed it but unable to trace it in my mobile, using nexus 5
title: Unable to see app

author: Scott 316894
comment: No app in app drawer, no watch face in android wear or on watch itself.
title: Cannot see watchface

author: Faisal Bahashwan
comment: Just missing 2 features first is always on (no ambient) and a way to donate!
title: Best I have seen

author: Richard Haakma
comment: Does what it says. Simple watch face with black background to make a long battery life on oled display. Permissions set to not steal your privacy. Top marks for that.
title: Simple and works

author: John Izquierdo
comment: Everything about these faces are fantastic but it is having a hard time syncing when I choose a new style.
title: Hard time syncing.

author: sammy laver
comment: No instructions on how to change the watch face, no app on phone and no obvious icon to customise.

author: Bujar
comment: The best face watch I have used and I used quite few. Classic, simple nice

author: Dalen Whitten
comment: How do i get simOclock on my moto 360

author: Freeline Asia
comment: Very nice,  but need instruction on how to get to customization page.

author: Yee Keat Phuah
comment: Hope there's an option to disable the watch battery.
title: Perfect!

author: Yggua Zoid
comment: Simple yet informative. My daily driver from now on!
title: Amazing!

author: Bryan Lee
comment: I love the minimal aesthetic!
title: So clean and beautifully designed!

author: Kareem SalahEldin
comment: Loved the simplicity and the beauty of the watch well
title: Simple beauty

author: Rich Corso
comment: This is an amazing watch face!

author: Mithoon Uthya
comment: Love it
title: Simple and Elegant

author: George Gabris
comment: excellent

author: Kimbo Price
comment: I bought simOclock not five minutes ago and I already love it. I got myself a Moto 360 a week ago and I've amassed a collection of 20 different faces, and sometimes - sometimes I really just want a low-profile, minimal look - simOclock gave me just that. With a bunch of different presets available (change through Wear) and the ability to customize yourself you're getting bang for your buck here! I really, really appreciate the seconds animation on the 360, the fact that it doesn't go below the black dead-space at the bottom is awesome, haven't seen that yet. Thanks!
title: Gorgeous colors and seconds animation!

author: Kevin Miller
comment: I especially love the Moto 360 compatibility with the seconds smoothly tracking along the bottom never going out of sight. I'd like the name of the watch face to be optional. And the ability to use your own backgrounds and colors. So I gave it 4 stars because it has some room for improvement.
title: Simple. Attractive.

author: Muhtad Khan
comment: It's easy and simple to customize! It would be more cool if we have more options against customizing the Hr/Sec/Min hands
title: Simple and Great

author: Andi Darmika
comment: I like the simplicity, please add option for a plain/solid color background and distinct seconds. Then this will be a 5 stars ;)
title: Like it

comment: Moto 360... Great watch face, beautiful, and easy on the battery. However, the battery indicator only updates when the watch face is set, not throughout the day.
title: Battery Indication Doesn't Update

author: Andrew Polland
comment: But could do with a slightly nicer ambient mode. Some options around displaying battery and date would be good too.
title: Really nice

author: Tim Anslow
comment: Can we have the option of hiding the logo please?

reply.author: Nerd Attack!
reply.content: Great suggestion! We'll plan this in a future update :)

title: Looks great

author: Enrique Zapata
comment: It'll be nice to have a weather option.
title: Like it

author: Ahmed Alsharkawi
comment: Amazing watch faces
title: 👍

author: catalin zt
comment: Decent price & beautiful work ! Thanks ♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡
title: Brilliant !

author: Muhammad Abdo LLAH
comment: Nice work

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: I really like this face. It just needs a little more customizable options like using our own photo for a background. The second hand indicator is always visible on my Moto 360 and doesn't get lost behind the "flat tire" 😁.
title: Very nice

author: paco lee
comment: Will be perfect if can add own photo background
